mapper.select: select e.store_code storeCode, e.store_name storeName, CONCAT_WS('-',b.dic_name,c.dic_name,d.dic_name,e.address) address, f.user_code userCode, f.user_name userName, f.phone phone from t_supplier a left join t_dictionary b on a.province_code = b.dic_code left join t_dictionary c on a.city_code = c.dic_code left join t_dictionary d on a.area_code = d.dic_code left join t_store e on (a.city_code = e.city_code and a.area_code = e.area_code) left join t_sys_user f on e.user_code = f.user_code where a.is_deleted = 0 and e.is_deleted = 0 and a.user_code = #{userCode}
select role from t_sys_user where user_code = #{userId}

select b.user_code userCode, a.user_name userName, a.phone phone, a.image_path imagePath, a.role role from t_sys_user a,t_supplier b where b.is_deleted = 0 and b.user_code = #{userId} and a.user_code = b.user_code
